text: My Little Pony Collaboration is still live! Keep hitting the Tree of Harmony for Exhibition Passes, Moonlight Crystals, and Badge Pull Tokens, then swing by the Specialty Exhibition to preview the latest pony costumes.
Syok sikit — the Heartopia mausoleum statue got iced over overnight, and the community is helping drop warm teas to keep it from cracking. The winter builds keep getting wilder!
Stranger sightings got me locking doors and leaning on Heartopia’s guardian chats for safety. If you pop into town, leave a note or gift so new friends feel less spooked.
